TopicTitle: BUG on docking controls and docking ports

Articles.Content:
hi there fellow Kerben-orts,

i would like to report somethings to you today.

i have found two bugs that could lead to breaking the game, i'm not sure if it was fixed as i installed the game via steam so i can only hope you guys can help. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

1 - docking controls - where you can move your space craft in to a docking percition to a second docking port using the RCS thusters for fine movements so that you can dock, this does not work as when you click on it the thusters do not switch from normal flight mode to docking mode.

is anyone else getting this?

2 - docking ports - after trying to dock 10 times in space and ten times with rovers that have docking ports, i found that the docking ports do NOT dock, automaticlly or manully. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

is anyone else getting this?

if so please can the bug hunting team look in to these problems as i fear that they could break the game in some way.

thanks. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Hi egorundead, please make sure the docking ports are fitted correctly, the skirt side is not a docking port.

Docking mode controls can be broken with old settings.cfg files, so delete the settings.cfg and restart KSP.
